title: How to Hide Your Facebook Friends List on the Android App

steps.title: No, you cannot hide the number of Facebook friends you've got.
steps.content: No, you cannot hide the number of Facebook friends you've got. In the past, it was possible to hide the number of Facebook friends you have. However, Facebook has changed their settings, and this is no longer possible. It is possible to hide your friends list . However, when you go to this menu in your Facebook Settings, you'll see at the top that it says "The number of friends you have is Public." Facebook has decided that the number of friends you have will always be public, regardless of if your actual friends list is visible or not. This is true for Facebook on Android as well as iPhone and desktop. One way to get around this is to completely hide your profile on Facebook. You can do this by adjusting your account's privacy settings. Learn how to hide your Facebook profile with this wikiHow article .

steps.title: Open the Facebook app on your device.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app on your device. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" inside a blue box on your Apps list. If you're not automatically signed into Facebook on your device, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in.

steps.title: Tap on the three horizontal lines icon.
steps.content: Tap on the three horizontal lines icon. It's in the upper-right corner of the Facebook app.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy > Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy > Settings . The Settings & Privacy option has an icon of a cog wheel.

steps.title: Tap How people find and contact you.
steps.content: Tap How people find and contact you . It's under the "Audience and visibility" heading. You'll have to scroll to find it.

steps.title: Tap Who can see your friends list?.
steps.content: Tap Who can see your friends list? . This option is near the top, under the "Your friends" header. It will open a menu with different privacy options.

steps.title: Select Only me from the menu.
steps.content: Select Only me from the menu. Only me has an icon of a lock next to it. This option hides your friends list and the number of friends you have from everybody but you. [1] X Research source Your friends will still be able to see your mutual friends even when you select Only me .

steps.title: Open the Facebook app on your device.
steps.content: Open the Facebook app on your device. The Facebook icon looks like a white "f" inside a blue box on your Apps list. You can also hide the people, Pages, or lists you follow on Facebook. If you'd like to keep these private, follow the steps in this section. If you're not automatically signed into Facebook on your device, enter your email address or phone number and your password to log in.

steps.title: Tap on the three horizontal lines icon.
steps.content: Tap on the three horizontal lines icon. It's in the upper-right corner of the Facebook app.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy > Settings.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap Settings & Privacy > Settings . The Settings & Privacy option has an icon of a cog wheel.

steps.title: Tap Followers and public content.
steps.content: Tap Followers and public content . It's under the "Audience and Visibility" section. You'll have to scroll to find it.

steps.title: Tap Who can see the people, Pages, and lists you follow?.
steps.content: Tap Who can see the people, Pages, and lists you follow? . This will open a menu where you can select an audience.

steps.title: Select Only me from the menu.
steps.content: Select Only me from the menu. Only me has an icon of a lock next to it. This will hide the people, Pages, and lists you follow from everyone on Facebook. [2] X Research source If you follow someone, a story may still appear about it in your friends' feeds. Your name may still be visible on the following list of the people, Pages, or lists you follow, unless that list is made private by the person who controls that page.
